title: Om Shanti Om
writer: Farah Khan, Mushtaq Sheikh, Mayur Puri
short_cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Shreyas Talpade, Arjun Rampal, Kiron Kher, Javed Sheikh
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Shreyas Talpade, Arjun Rampal, Kiron Kher, Javed Sheikh
genre: Romantic Comedies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: Reincarnated 30 years after being killed in a suspicious on-set fire, a small-time actor is determined to punish the person who ignited the blaze.
